# Top N report

## Basic metrics selected

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
metric <- data.frame(variables = params$variables)
for (i in length(params$metric)) {
    metric[,params$metric[i]] = rep(0, length(params$variables))
    for (j in length(params$variables)) {
        if (params$metric[i] == 'Mean') {
            metric[j,params$metric[i]] = mean(dem[,params$variables[j]])
        } else if (params$metric[i] == 'Median') {
            metric[j,params$metric[i]] = median(dem[,params$variables[j]])
        } else if (params$metric[i] == 'Max') {
            metric[j,params$metric[i]] = max(dem[,params$variables[j]])
        } else if (params$metric[i] == 'Min') {
            metric[j,params$metric[i]] = min(dem[,params$variables[j]])
        }
    }
}
```
